---
title: "About"
---

This is the website for an Ohio State University workshop on Amplicon Metabarcoding,
held from March 13-15, 2024 in Wooster, Ohio.

This workshop is co-organized by:

- Dr. Soledad Benitez-Ponce, Dept. of Plant Pathology
- Dr. Timothy Frey, Dept. of Plant Pathology
- Dr. Jelmer Poelstra, Molecular and Cellular Imaging Center (MCIC)
- Fiama Guevara, Dept. of Plant Pathology
- Melanie Medina Lopez, Dept. of Plant Pathology
